https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xPJXnsr22CUReVgtfMzi5rNvaBX.jpg Nicholas is a young cinematographer, shooting a documentary about the ancient tribal ritual in an Indian village near the Amazon, where he fell in love with the daughter of a chief, at the same time more and more like the side of the original dailylife, and a more in-depth understanding of their ancient customs, however, he found where deforestation has become increasingly serious ...... Amazon Forever
